about_the_game:
Enter the world of Alia, discover its wonders and dangers, and guide Neniu in his search for his history.



Magical powers

As you uncover your past, your gifts awaken and help you progress better in the world of Alia.



Smart, brain-tickling puzzles

Use the abilities you gain throughout the game to solve puzzles. Combine your powers or use your wit to craft items, and advance to the next step.



A rich narrative in an enchanted forest

Explore an enchanted land filled with friendly creatures. In the forest, new surprises await behind each tree. Adventure is just waiting for you.



An interactive story

Your actions matter and will impact the narrative. They shape your journey and will ultimately decide the path you want to take. As you explore this new world, forge your own story.



Features:
- Exploration in a linear setup
- Use of magical powers
- Gathering materials and crafting objects
- Puzzle-Solving
- Compelling storyline
- Immersive universe
- Several alternative endings

name: Alia's Chronicles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950, Radeon R7 360, or Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060, Radeon RX 5600 XT, or Intel Arc A580
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Alia’s Chronicles is a puzzle-narrative game where you play as Neniu, a semi-elf on his quest for identity. Every action you take impacts the story! Craft tools, use your powers to solve puzzles, and prove yourself to the inhabitants of this enchanting world.
supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
